project.name: Openstack
project.description: The Gentoo Openstack Project maintains packages for Openstack and some of it's dependancies.

longdescription.p: Openstack is a virtualization orchestration suite that allows the creation and management of cloud infrastructures. Openstack provides applications that simplify IaaS (Nova, Horizon, Ceilometer, etc.) deployments and management. It also provides secondary services such as dynamic block storage (Cinder), dynamic databasing (Red Dwarf), etc.
Openstack manages several hypervisors including but not limited to the following (for a full listing see upstream):

ul.li: Raise Gentoo to a first class citizen for hosting Openstack
Maintain major releases in portage (including live builds)
Provide a usable turn-key continuous deployment strategy for Openstack
Provide communication media (i.e. IRC, mailing list, mail alias, etc.)

body.p: You can reach all our developers (and some users of course) in #gentoo-virtualization on irc.freenode.net
We have a list on lists.gentoo.org named gentoo-openstack along with a openstack alias on the primary gentoo hostname.
